Class PieceBin

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
              • view.PieceBin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class PieceBin
extends javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
    Displays the piece bin. Holds all the characters and how many each player is supposed to have of each.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PieceBin

        public PieceBin(BoardScene scene,
                boolean team)
        Constructor. Sets the global variables, creates the BoardCells for the pieces, and creates the amounts each piece should hold.
        Parameters:
        scene - The scene object to add PieceBin to
        team - False for team red, true for team blue

    • Method Detail

      • resetPieces

        public void resetPieces()
        Sets up the pieces inside a bin.

      • remainingPieces

        public java.util.List<Piece> remainingPieces()
        Goes through the pieces and sees which pieces still have amounts left. Returns the list of pieces.
        Returns:
        A list of the remaining pieces.

      • disableAll

        public void disableAll()
        Disables the pieces. Sets the amounts to zero for each piece.

      • updateHighlight

        private void updateHighlight(int row,
                             int col)
        Highlights the piece when selected.
        Parameters:
        row - Row of piece.
        col - Column of piece.

      • onDeselect

        public void onDeselect(BoardCell cell)
        Gets the row and column from the passed BoardCell. Calls updateHightlight.
        Parameters:
        cell - Selected BoardCell.

      • takePiece

        public Piece takePiece(BoardCell cell,
                       boolean team)
        Selects piece. Removes one amount if there are any. If there aren't return null. Gets row and column of BoardCell and updates highlight. Returns the Piece.
        Parameters:
        cell - Current BoardCell selected.
        team - Team.
        Returns:
        Null if no more amount, Piece if there are amounts left.
